page.title: 19AT SCHOOL IN S.E.LUTON(2)
page.content:
{Hillborough Junior School }was opened ten years ago to relieve overcrowding in other schools.Now Hillborough,like its neighbours,has empty places because of a fall in the birth rate. Here are the views of some pupils aged 9 and 10.
{Kathryn }liked the teachers unless she was told off! {Caroline }enjoyed P.E.and writing. {Andrew }liked computer work,maths and playtime. {Rory }didn't like school very much, especially having to get up early in the mornings. {Emma }looked forward to meeting her friends for a good natter. {Barry's }dislikes were English and doing historical things.
